notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: C.F., P.M., A.G., N.T. conceived the study. C.F. performed chip experiments, analysed and interpreted the data. S.M. performed RNA extraction experiments. M.E. was involved in experiments with plasmids. G.C. performed the phylogenetic analysis. P.M., S.M., F.S., T.A.-Z., M.K., T.S., O.V., L.M., R.G.U., M.G. were involved in providing viruses from endemic area. N.T., A.G., S.V.W. supported the work. V.C. and J.C.M. helped in using microarray platform. C.F. and N.T. drafted the manuscript. P.M., G.C., A.G. and R.G.U. revised the manuscript. All authors approved the final version of the manuscript.
